form.heading: Create new release
form.description: Create a new release by giving it a name and version.

errors.create-single: There was an error creating the release
errors.create-plural: There were errors creating the release

errors.create-single: There was an error updating the release
errors.create-plural: There were errors updating the release

save-changes-prompt.title: You have unsaved changes
save-changes-prompt.message: Are you sure you want to lose your changes?
save-changes-prompt.warning1: Your unsaved changes will be lost if you leave this page or tab.
save-changes-prompt.warning2: You can save you changes, discard your changes, or cancel to continue editing.

release-information.title: Release information
release-information.description: Add information that will be displayed to customers about the description of the release and any new features or changes included. Also, add and remove additional languages and localised content that will be required for this release.

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: What is included in the new release?

errors.required: The release information description is required

whats-new.label: What's new?
whats-new.placeholder: What are the new features in the release?

errors.create-single: There was an error updating the release information
errors.create-plural: There were errors updating the release information

files.title: Files
files.description: Select and add files to be included in this release.

errors.plural: There were errors when saving the files
errors.singular: There was an error saving the files
errors.file-exists: The file, "{{fileName}}", already exists for the release
errors.file-too-big: The file, "{{fileName}}", is larger than than {{maxFileSizeMB}}MB
errors.file-name-too-long: The file, "{{fileName}}", has a name of more than ${maxFileNameLength} characters
errors.file-extension-invalid: The file, "{{fileName}}", does not have a valid extension

validate-upload.title: Validate the firmware file
validate-upload.description: The firmware file needs to be validated before it can be distributed to customers.
validate-upload.download-file-description: Download the executable file that has been uploaded
validate-upload.run-checksum-description: Did the file pass the checksum validation?
validate-upload.validation-passed-description: The uploaded file has been validated for distribution.
validate-upload.validation-failed-description: Re-upload the file and try again
validate-upload.no-firmware-description: In order to run checksum validation, you must first upload a file and mark it as "firmware".

regional-distribution.title: Regional distribution
regional-distribution.description: Select the countries where this firmware will be distributed.

publish-release.description-1: The release is being published to the package service.
publish-release.description-2: Depending on the size and number of release files, this may take several minutes.

archive-modal.message-plural: You are about to archive the following releases:
archive-modal.message-singular: Are you sure you want to archive <0 />?

delete-modal.message-plural: You are about to delete the following releases:
delete-modal.message-singular: Are you sure you want to delete <0 />?
delete-modal.message-no-restore: Deleted draft releases cannot be restored.

release-published.heading: Release published
release-published.description-1: The release has been published and is now available for users to download.
release-published.description-2: Check the all releases table for details or to edit the release.

errors.no-countries: There have not been any countries selected.
errors.not-validated: The firmware upload has not been validated.
errors.file-type-or-language: There are files that haven't been assigned a file type or language.
errors.no-firmware: The release does not have a file set as firmware.
errors.multiple-firmware-files: The release has more than one file set as firmware.
errors.no-release-information: The release has no release information set.
errors.invalid-release-information: There is release information that hasn't been assigned a description or what's new text.

files.title: Files
files.unresolved-message: There are files that haven't been assigned a file type or language

empty-list.message-2: Try changing the filters or search term, or download a release

reports.heading: Reports
reports.sub-heading: Generate a report of software downloads
reports.description: Create and export a report of who has downloaded our software.

api-errors.singular: There was an error generating the report
api-errors.plural: There were errors generating the report

validation.release-required: At least one release version is required
validation.country-required: At least one country is required
